name: twister-react
description: proxy-based Twister client written with react-js

scripts.build: jsx jsx build-buffer && browserify build-buffer/App.js -o build/app-bundle.js
scripts.pull-lib-and-build: cd ../twister-lib-js && npm run bundle && cd ../twister-react && cp ../twister-lib-js/twister-lib.js build && jsx jsx build-buffer && browserify build-buffer/App.js -o build/app-bundle.js

author: Julian Steinwachs
